data.oai_dc:dc: 19 bioclimatic variables for current conditions, Last Glacial Maximum and mid-Holocene (MIROC and CCSM models), extracted from the Wordclim database for the study region (European Alps). Additionally, elevation data and the "surface area" variable are included (see Materials and Methods for more details).
Population Ecology|Life History Evolution|Niche Modelling|Phylogeography|Population Genetics - Empirical
